= Requirements =
== Function ==
 * Communication to [ICARUS_ROVER_RC]
 * Drive Servos
 * Command/Response for Recharging

== I/O ==
 * PWM Output: 3 (Drive,Steer,Winch)
 * DI Interrupts: 4 (Drive Quadrature Encoder, Winch Quadrature Encoder)
 * DI: 2(Charger x2) 
 * Analog In: 2 (Power Sensor x2)
 * Comm: 1 (UART)
 *
